Theme System / Preset Themes

Preset Themes

LuxeUI includes 8 carefully crafted theme presets. Each provides a complete set of colors, typography, spacing, and effects designed to work beautifully together.

Usage

Apply a preset theme using the .luxeTheme() modifier:

Swift 
import LuxeUI

// Apply at app root for global theming
ContentView()
    .luxeTheme(.midnight)

// Or on specific views for local overrides
SettingsPanel()
    .luxeTheme(.light)
